find_sentences_in_chaiyaphum.name: Sentences in Chaiyaphum
description: Talk to everybody in Chaiyaphum and learn the sentences they have to teach.

implant_source_behind_the_temple.name: First source implant
description: Go behind the temple, produce the word อะไร, and implant it into the source that is used for training shamans.

implant_word_cut.name: Repopulate ตัด
description: We get the Spell for cut: ตัด. We have to implant it into a source. When we have done so, the quest is complete.
Until we do so, we can get the Spell again and again at the shaman.
